riingo
  • Home
  • Function Reference

Get meta data about a cryptocurrency on Tiingo

Source: R/meta.R

Relevant returned meta data include: ticker, name, description, quote currency, and base currency.

riingo_crypto_meta(ticker)

Arguments

ticker

One or more cryptocurrency tickers. Specified as "btcusd" for bitcoin quoted in USD. A character vector.

Examples


# Bitcoin meta
riingo_crypto_meta("btcusd")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>   ticker description      quoteCurrency baseCurrency name                    
#>   <chr>  <chr>            <chr>         <chr>        <chr>                   
#> 1 btcusd Tether (BTC/USD) usd           btc          Bitcoin Tether (BTC/USD)

# A trick to return ALL crypto meta data
# For some reason Descriptions are not returned here
riingo_crypto_meta("")
#> # A tibble: 2,282 x 5
#>    ticker   description quoteCurrency baseCurrency name                  
#>    <chr>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>        <chr>                 
#>  1 xmyltc   ""          ltc           xmy          Myriad (XMY/LTC)      
#>  2 atmsdoge ""          doge          atms         Atmos (ATMS/DOGE)     
#>  3 brdeth   ""          eth           brd          BRD (BRD/ETH)         
#>  4 weeddoge ""          doge          weed         Weed (WEED/DOGE)      
#>  5 yywusd   ""          usd           yyw          YYW (YYW/USD)         
#>  6 vprcdoge ""          doge          vprc         VapersCoin (VPRC/DOGE)
#>  7 mnaeth   ""          eth           mna          MNA (MNA/ETH)         
#>  8 batbnb   ""          bnb           bat          BAT (BAT/BNB)         
#>  9 c2ltc    ""          ltc           c2           Coin2 (C2/LTC)        
#> 10 aideth   ""          eth           aid          AID (AID/ETH)         
#> # ... with 2,272 more rows
